greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Values of 2x + y, where x^2 + xy + y^2=p (x<y) is a prime of the form 6n + 1 (=A002476).
mathematica: Reap[For[n = 1, n <= 200, n++, If[PrimeQ[p = 6 n + 1], s = Solve[x^2 + x y + y^2 == p && 0 < x < y, {x, y}, Integers];
results.author: _Lekraj Beedassy_, Nov 03 2003
